You decide to stay put. Someone might find you, and you're exhausted anyway.

You decide to have a short nap, and wake up sometime later feeling much rested. You draw your name in the sand, and eventually get bored of that.

You're just about to get up and explore when the surf suddenly crashes and a huge creature comes out of the sea.

It looks like a dragon, but also like an orca. It is incredibly blubbery, and its fat tongue was hanging out of its mouth.

You get up to run, when it suddenly speaks.

"Help...me...."

You stop, and stare.

"Help...me.." It repeats. You decide to answer.

"How?" you say, a bit wary, but also aroused by the creatures hugeness and bulk.

It takes a while to respond." I am injured." it wheezes.

"Injured how?"

It lowers its head a bit."I'm not sure." it says. "I just have this terrible pain..."

"Where is the pain?" you say slowly, like talking to a toddler.

"I don't know. Can you help me? Can you find where the pain is?" it says, eyes desperate.

"Emm... I'm not sure... But i can try."

You go up to it, and look it over.

"Can you roll over please?" you ask.

info.description:
You play as a 20 year old human with not memory of how you ended up in the middle of the jungle with only a knife, some rope and a back pack. You find that while escaping the jungle that most of the creatures living here are dragons. Most would do anything to have you slid down there throat and right in to his stomach and just feel you wiggle around.

You need to find help in this jungle if you want to survive from being nutrition to some dragon or to any other creature that lives here. From giant snakes to mythical beasts, or other things such as carnivorous plants. It may seem like justan adventure but you come to know that your trapped in the maze. Will you get out and survive?

Befriend a one of the creatures of the jungle for your guide and protector threw out th story. you will come across mostly dragon hybrids or outcasts as well. They may attack or help on your way. it's up to you to decide if you show faith you will live on or she will turn you right in to Death's path. Oh and you might wanna get him a few supplies of food or your new 'friends might eat you.


A few things to know:
Please ... No gore, just soft vore, I will allow blood BUT only when the characters are injured in battle. If they do get eaten, no chewing at the up most. Add pretty much as you like, but anything off topic or chapters that is has two lines or less will be deleted. When it comes to sexual moments, please.... no animal sex with the main character. I'll allow humanoid sex, and they may eat him or her afterwards, the most I will for some dragon sex for the main character is tongues on the chest, vagina or crouch, etc are allowed. If you don't do this, I will delete your entry.

Thanks and enjoy
